meanings.definition: Carry out, accomplish, or fulfill (an action, task, or function)
meanings.sent1: She performs her daily chores diligently.
meanings.sent2: The actor performs on stage every night.
meanings.sent3: The robot performs a dance routine for fun.
meanings.sent4: The engine performs like a champion in races.
meanings.sent5: The magician performs tricks that leave the audience amazed.

meanings.definition: Present a form of entertainment to an audience
meanings.sent1: The clown performs funny tricks at the circus.
meanings.sent2: The band performs live concerts around the country.
meanings.sent3: The puppet performs a comedy show for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The juggler performs a balancing act with skill.
meanings.sent5: The magician performs illusions that mesmerize the crowd.

meanings.definition: Function or operate in a specified way
meanings.sent1: The machine performs efficiently without any errors.
meanings.sent2: The car performs well on rough terrains.
meanings.sent3: The clock performs a little dance when the alarm goes off.
meanings.sent4: The computer performs tasks at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The athlete performs at their best during important competitions.
